bookinfo.releaseinfo: This manual describes version 2.30 of Evolution

abstract.para: A user's guide to Evolution which explains how to use its mail, calendar, address book, and task list features.

bookinfo.title: Evolution 2.30 User Guide

preface.title: Об этом Руководстве
preface.para: This guide describes how to use and manage Evolution 2.30 client software. This guide is intended for users and is divided into the following sections:

formalpara.title: Дополнительная документация:
formalpara.para: Дополнительную помощь можно получить тремя способами:

listitem.para: Evolution has a number of command line options that you can use. For information about command line options, open a terminal window and type evolution --help.
Щёлкните в Evolution Справка > Содержание справки.

formalpara.title: Условные обозначения в документации:
formalpara.para: In Novell documentation, a greater-than symbol (>) is used to separate actions within a step and items in a cross-reference path. A trademark symbol (, , etc.) denotes a Novell trademark. An asterisk (*) denotes a third-party trademark.

chapter.title: Приступая к работе
chapter.para: Evolution is a groupware application that helps you work in a group by handling email, address, memos, tasks, and one or more calendars. This makes the tasks of storing, organizing, and retrieving your personal information easy, so you can work and communicate effectively with others.

listitem.para: Запуск клиента Evolution.

entry.para: Щёлкните K меню > Офис > Дополнительно > Evolution.

section.title: Использование Помощника по установке Evolution
section.para: The first time you run Evolution, it creates a directory named .evolution in your home directory, where it stores all of its local data. Then, it opens a First-Run Assistant to help you set up email accounts and import data from other applications.
Использование Помощника по установке Evolution занимает от двух до пяти минут.

В дальнейшем, если потребуется изменить эту учётную запись или если вы захотите создать новую запись, щёлкните Правка > Параметры, затем щёлкните Учётные записи. Выберите запись, которую хотите изменить, затем нажмите Правка. Другим способом, добавьте новую запись, щёлкнув Добавить. Смотрите Настройка Почты для подробностей.
Помощник по установке Evolution помогает предоставить Evolution необходимую для запуска информацию.

section.title: Получение почты
section.para: The Receiving Email option lets you determine where you get your email.
Вам нужно указать тип сервера, с которого вы хотите получать почту. Если вы не уверены относительно выбора типа сервера, обратитесь к вашему системному администратору или интернет-провайдеру.

listitem.para: Выберите тип сервера в списке Тип сервера.
Здесь перечислены доступные типы серверов:

formalpara.title: Novell GroupWise:
formalpara.para: Select this option if you connect to a Novell GroupWise server.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Remote Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Microsoft Exchange:
formalpara.para: Available only if the evolution-exchange package is installed. Select this option if you connect to a Microsoft Exchange 2000 or 2003 server.

listitem.para: Email, calendar, and contact information are stored on the server.
For configuration instructions, see Remote Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: MAPI Exchange:
formalpara.para: Available only if you have installed the evolution-mapi package and if the Exchange MAPI plugin from the Edit > Plugins menu is enabled. It allows you to connect to a Microsoft Exchange 2007 server.

listitem.para: Email, calendar, and contact information are stored on the server.

formalpara.title: IMAP:
formalpara.para: Keeps the email on your server so you can access your email from multiple systems.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Remote Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: POP:
formalpara.para: Downloads your email to your hard disk for permanent storage, freeing up space on the email server.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Remote Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Новости USENET:
formalpara.para: Connects to a news server and downloads a list of available news digests.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Remote Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Локальная доставка:
formalpara.para: Choose this option if you want to move email from the spool (the location where mail waits for delivery) and store it in your home directory. You need to provide the path to the mail spool you want to use. If you want to leave email in your system's spool files, choose the Standard Unix Mbox Spool option instead.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Local Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Почтовые каталоги в формате UNIX MH:
formalpara.para: If you download your email using MH or another MH-style program, you should use this option.

listitem.para: You need to provide the path to the mail directory you want to use.
For configuration instructions, see Local Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Почтовые каталоги в формате Maildir:
formalpara.para: If you download your email using Qmail or another Maildir-style program, you should use this option.

listitem.para: You need to provide the path to the mail directory you want to use.
For configuration instructions, see Local Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Standard Unix mbox Spool File:
formalpara.para: If you want to read and store email in the mail spool file on your local system, choose this option. You need to provide the path to the mail spool file you want to use.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Local Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Standard Unix mbox Spool Directory:
formalpara.para: If you want to read and store email in the mail spool directory on your local system, choose this option. You need to provide the path to the mail spool directory you want to use.

listitem.para: For configuration instructions, see Local Configuration Options.

formalpara.title: Нет:
formalpara.para: Select this if you do not plan to check email with this account. If you select this, there are no configuration options.
